attributes.action: Scrap legal aid for all convicted criminals and recent immigrants
attributes.background: Scrap all legal aid for all immigrants and convicted criminals. We think legal aid should not be available for immigrants who have paid less than 15 years tax and that repeat offenders should not have access.
